duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain complex and detailed calendar, manage the coordination and logistics of both internal and external meetings
Arrange and coordinate complicated domestic and international travel, and organize all aspects for conferences and internal events, including catering and transportation

Process invoices and T&E expense claims for team members. Ensure all policies are followed and items are processed within provided guidelines. Act as a subject matter expert for policies and procedures
Assist staff in requesting equipment setup and supplies
Produce high quality emails and messages to individuals at all levels of the organization
Maintain current organizational charts Assist in editing spreadsheets and presentations, including printing and binding, for client meetings
Work cooperatively with the administrative assistants team, in positive partnership to support each other smoothly, and lead and coordinate on ad hoc projects as requested

skills.skill: Tact and good judgment in confidential situations
